events.message: We have received the candidate’s application for the software engineer position at our company.
The candidate’s background was reviewed and the application was categorised under Engineering roles related to software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to guide the candidate through the hiring process for the engineering role.
The candidate participated in an initial screening call to discuss their experience in software development and their fit for the role.
The candidate replied promptly, expressing enthusiasm and confirming availability for the next steps.
A technical interview was scheduled with the candidate to assess their coding skills and problem-solving ability.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and the candidate demonstrated strong software engineering knowledge.
An HR interview was scheduled to review company culture fit and discuss employment terms with the candidate.
The HR interview concluded positively, with the candidate showing interest in the company’s values and policies.
An offer for the engineering position was extended to the candidate, including details about compensation and benefits.
The candidate responded with positive feedback regarding the offer and requested some clarifications about the role.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and expressed excitement to join our engineering team.
The onboarding process started for the new software engineer, including orientation and setting up necessary tools.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering department.
